name: vscode-devtools-mcp
description: MCP server for VS Code DevTools

scripts.bundle: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run build:full && rollup -c rollup.config.mjs && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('build/node_modules', {recursive: true, force: true})"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && node --experimental-strip-types --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning scripts/post-build.ts
scripts.build:full: pnpm run clean:all && tsc && node --experimental-strip-types --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning scripts/post-build.ts
scripts.dev: pnpm run clean && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json && node --experimental-strip-types --no-warnings=ExperimentalWarning scripts/post-build.ts && tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --watch --preserveWatchOutput
scripts.docs: pnpm run build && pnpm run docs:generate && pnpm run format
scripts.start-debug: DEBUG=mcp:* DEBUG_COLORS=false pnpm run build && node build/src/index.js
scripts.inspect: pnpm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector node build/src/index.js --test-workspace ../test-workspace --extension ../extension
scripts.inspect:cli: pnpm run build && npx @modelcontextprotocol/inspector --cli node build/src/index.js --test-workspace ../test-workspace --extension ../extension
